title: black screen after loading into the game
body:
Hey, 
a week ago everything was ok with my laptop (playing LoL etc), then I had to travel a bit and now 8 days later, when I tried to run LoL... shit went down - everything is ok, but after champ select, I see the loading screen with the champs and players loading, as soon as everyone reaches 100% and the game is supposed to start, I see the summoners spawn platform for a second and then the screen goes black - I can still hear the music, I can still see the ingame mouse move it, but I CANNOT see shit - any suggestions ? [dxdiag](http://www.fast-files.com/getfile.aspx?file=122884)

thanks a lot in advance

replies.body:
Thanks for the help, it was the graphics drivers. Just to clarify - I did try the drivers before your comment, but it did not work out and then after your comment, I decided to try a full chipset reinstall and now everything is back to normal - if anyone else encounters this same problem, do not just install over the old/damaged drivers - uninstall, restart, install, restart...

thanks @Targons Blade
take care
best regards

It sounds like League is having a hard time communicating and interacting with your graphics driver. Most of the time this is caused by a malfunctioning driver or bad windows power settings. I recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a first step in fixing this.

Let me know if those steps resolved the problem.
